aalenna_shallIAssume: Shall I assume you know who I am?
aalenna_goodImImpressed: Good. I'm impressed you still came.
aalenna_solelyPossess: We monsters solely possess the ability to create new coins.
aalenna_advancePayment: Let's call this advance payment, with a promise of more if you achieve everything I set out.
chairman_oBounteousOne: What will you have of me, O bounteous one?
aalenna_princesDebts: Call on the prince's debts. Step into his place and lay off the guards.
aalenna_marchOnThePalace: I will then march on the palace unimpeded...
aalenna_rightfulPlace: #{shake:2,2}And take my rightful place as ruler of this pitiful land!
